name: A Smol Siren Tale
description:
You now officially a siren everybody yayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy........no? Ok but this is life, shit ain't always go straight to the toilet and deadlines can't just done by themselves,  ofcourse  a siren life surely can't go on without a little adventure... 
The story have a total of 13 endings (if my math skills still works properly).

 This is actually a test to see if my two braincells can keep up with Twine and prepare for a bigger project... (still about siren tho)
If there are any faults please don't hestiate to comment or just dm's my twitter account<3
